stories.title: Giant sinkholes found forming on the seafloor in northern Canada

stories.text:
When I build something, I usually do a Show HN and sometimes get a lot of attention.

Product Hunt is supposed to be similar, right?

But when I post something over there, it seems to just go into a black hole and disappear. There is no "new posts" page or anything. How is anyone finding out about new posts on Product Hunt? How do posts over there get their first upvotes?
stories.title: Product Hunt is a mystery to me

Samsung announces M8 smart monitor series
I built a real-time stock app with Python and Fast API, Next.js, and Redis Stack
Industries Stymied Justice for Young Lead Paint Victims

stories.text:
Solo founders who claim to have $1m ARR or more, without ever sharing any revenue proof - how do you trust them and start following their work online?

I've seen many founders tweet stuff out around a niche, but never sharing about their startup's revenue proof in public (stripe screenshot/financial dashboard). They just say they crossed $Xm ARR mark etc.

"You can fool those who wants to be fooled"

Curious to know what other baseless claims you'll have seen on the internet?
stories.title: Ask HN: How people blindly trust huge numbers on the internet?
